reuters.title: NORTH EAST INSURANCE CO <NEIC> 4TH QTR LOSS
reuters.body: Shr loss 85 cts vs loss 1.36 dlrs Net loss 1,653,386 vs loss 2,646,876 Year Shr loss 12 cts vs loss 1.30 dlrs Net loss 236,469 vs loss 2,522,293 NOTE: Year net includes realized investment gains of 734,609 dlrs vs 645,438 dlrs. Reuter 
